Question: ALLPOWERS INDUSTRIAL INTERNATIONAL LTD CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ALLPOWERS INDUSTRIAL INTERNATIONAL LTD

Product: ALLPOWERS SF200 Pro Solar Panel

- 200W Double-Sided Foldable Solar Panel
- 44% lighter than other solar panels, 2.5mm thick, and weighs 6KG
- Dual-Sided Power Generation with high-transmittance monocrystalline solar cells, 23% Efficiency Solar Panel with MC4 Output
- IP68 Proof Water, Dust-Proof, Solid, and Anti-Scratch, ETFE Material, thrives in extreme conditions
- Multi-Scene Usage, Hangable and Foldable, suitable for house, RV, camping, hiking, and fishing trips
- Available on Amazon and Official website in April 2024
- Committed to providing clean, green, and sustainable power solutions since 2010
Summary_cn:
ALLPOWERS INDUSTRIAL INTERNATIONAL LTD

产品：ALLPOWERS SF200 Pro 太阳能电池板

- 双面折叠太阳能电池板，功率为200W
- 比其他太阳能电池板轻44％，厚度为2.5mm，重6KG
- 双面发电，采用高透光性单晶硅太阳能电池，23％效率的太阳能电池板，带有MC4输出
- IP68级防水，防尘，坚固，防刮擦，ETFE材料，在极端环境中正常工作
- 适用于多种场景，可悬挂和折叠，适用于家庭、房车、露营、徒步旅行和钓鱼等场合
- 2024年4月在亚马逊和官方网站上有供应
- 自2010年以来致力于提供清洁、环保和可持续的电力解决方案
